ygData.subject: Re: hero bracer quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a Dark Elf and despise people trying to come and kill our guards.  You have plenty of other ways to get experience.  As far as I know helping guards is
ygData.messageBody:
I am a Dark Elf and despise people trying to come and kill our guards. You
have plenty of other ways to get experience. As far as I know helping
guards is perfectly legal. Buffing, healing, and training are all
legal. You do not HAVE to come there to get experience. As a matter of
fact you make players like me feel bad and YOU are the one who should be
warned IMHO.

Manr, Dark Elf Shadow Knight on Povar.

At 01:51 AM 9/22/99 , you wrote:
>From: KEPTINPIKE@...
>
>Dear Sirs:
>
> We were killing guards inside Neriak's foreign quarters. We play on the
>Solusek Ro server. I play as Keptin Pike. We were harassed by players there
>who were constantly dispelling us and dumping monsters (guards) on us. In
>fact they even managed to dump guards on us where Neriak zones to Nektulos
>So we got trapped on both sides of the zone due to monster dumping. Two of
>us died. I would like to remind you that we were not killing any vendors or
>quest related NPCs. Also, in the Foreign Quarter there is no danger to
>newbies from anything.
> GM Hidaeki said this was perfectly legal since they were role-playing.
>Hmm, I imagine I can do a lot of harassing and exploiting under the guise of
>role-playing. I asked about the exploit of PVP Switch Avoidance and he
>ignored me. I have posted said exploit below as posted on your site.
>
>PvP Switch Avoidance ï¿½ using in-game methods to work around the PvP switch
>and allowing non-PvP players to kill other players, such as hall blocking,
>dumping of monsters, or spell effects that cross that boundary due to a bug.
>
>
>Please tell me if those players who were killing us fall under this exploit
>and can be given an official warning.
